00019 #ifndef IDENTITY_ALIGNMENT_HEADER_FILE
00020 #define IDENTITY_ALIGNMENT_HEADER_FILE
00021 
00022 #include <ScoreMapBase.H>
00023 //#include <Sitemap.H>
00024 #include <ModelSitemap.H>
00025 
00026 namespace ASCbase{
00027 
00030 class IdentityAlignment{
00031 public:
00032 
00034   IdentityAlignment()
00035   { ; }
00036 
00038   virtual ~IdentityAlignment()
00039   { ; }
00040 
00042   template< typename align_T > bool
00043   align(ModelSitemap *query_site, Sitemap& dset_site, 
00044         std::vector<align_T> *alignments)
00045   {
00046     align_T my_align;
00047     std::fill(my_align.R, my_align.R + 9, 0.0);
00048     my_align.R[0] = my_align.R[4] = my_align.R[8] = 1.0;
00049     std::fill(my_align.T, my_align.T + 3, 0.0);
00050     my_float_t Q[] = {1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00051     my_align.Q = Quaternion(Q, 4);
00052     alignments->push_back(my_align);
00053     return true;
00054   }
00055 
00056 };
00057 } // end namespace ASCbase
00058 #endif
